|Title=Photograph/video of post-paralytic facial hemispasm
|Description=None
|Rubric=Multimedia content
|Contributors=
|Order=9}}
Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

properties.question: In the context of post-paralytic facial hemispasm, what is the primary purpose of analyzing a photograph/video?
properties.option_a: To assess the patient's ability to smile symmetrically
properties.option_b: To evaluate the effectiveness of facial muscle retraining exercises
properties.option_c: To determine the presence and severity of hemispasm
properties.option_d: To monitor changes in facial skin texture over time
